title: What is the difference between NIT and a private college? - Quora

response.answer_text: As NITs are government colleges and many of nits are very much prestigious in India and with a good choice for recuiters. BT many pvt. colleges provide a very great educational opportunities. And if a buddy work smartly and with a zeal and he can leave behind iits also in certain aspects. BT caliber always boasts you. If you are in any pvt. College . You don't need to worry bt there is a pre-requisite you have to work hardlying,smartly. And word smartly matters most for eg. If you are on cse or eee you can make AI & AR to go thru the forward passage,if u are in mechanical u need to think some big . Or u can foccus on GATE and IES as they can remove your all tensions if cleared nicely. And there is no need to worry for faculties too as different colleges like mit and other open videos are also available. So in single line,the difference in nit and pvt. College are that nitians got an extra opportunity if they can nicely grant it and make use of it they have a great carrier bt in pvt. College you still now have to seach for that opportunity and can be created by ur skills and dedication. Bz each and every body knows that caliber always boasts.

Difference is NITs starts with N and other college may start from any alphabet which exist in this beautiful world. You don’t need to be worry about it as you already have achieved a lot in your field at present. And IAS aspirants only need to be graduate from any college.
